articles.description:
Hey HN

Weâ€™ve built OSMEA (Open Source Mobile E-commerce Architecture) â€” a complete, open-source Flutter ecosystem for building scalable, production-ready e-commerce applications.

Instead of starting from scratch or stitching together random plugins, OSMEA provides a modular architecture, custom UI kit, and ready-to-use API integrations for Shopify, WooCommerce, and custom backends.

Highlights

Modular & Composable â€“ Build only what you need.

Platform-Agnostic â€“ Shopify, WooCommerce, or any API.

Custom UI Kit â€“ Themeable, production-ready Flutter components.

Enterprise-Ready â€“ CI/CD, test coverage, async-safe architecture.

Cross-Platform â€“ iOS, Android, Web, and Desktop from one codebase.

We designed it to help teams ship e-commerce apps up to 70% faster while keeping the codebase clean, testable, and maintainable.

Repo (MIT License): https://github.com/masterfabric-mobile/osmea

Weâ€™d love to hear feedback from the community â€” especially around:

architecture scalability

integration improvements

real-world deployment experiences

Thanks for checking it out!

Show HN: Music Visualizer with Animated Color Themes Created via ChatGPT Prompts
articles.description:
I built an open source real-time music visualizer that lets you create animated color themes simply by describing them with natural language prompts. ChatGPT helps convert your descriptions into live visual styles.

The visualization is fully customizable and powered by DSP and GPU shaders.
